title: 108_hr2022
content: Leave No Securities Behind Act - Amends the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Act to extend Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) authority to mortgage-backed and subordinate obligations, and corporate securities of the Federal National Mortgage Association . Amends the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Act to extend SEC authority to corporate securities of the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation . Amends the Securities Act of 1933 to limit specified SEC registration fees.
